articles.author: Haresh Menghani
articles.title: Gold price pulls back after rising to fresh all-time high, bullish potential remains intact - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price (XAU/USD) builds on its recent strong rally witnessed over the past three weeks or so and surges to a fresh record high, around the $2,144-2,145 region during the Asian session on Monday.
articles.content:
• Gold price gains strong positive traction on Monday and spikes to a fresh all-time peak.
  • The cautious market mood, along with dovish Fed expectations, benefits the XAU/USD.

articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: Threatened By EW Attack, North Korea Warns US Of ‘Declaration Of War’ If Space Assets Attacked - EurAsian Times
articles.description: North Korea issued a stern warning on December 2, stating that any interference with its satellite operations would be perceived as a declaration of war.
articles.content:
North Korea issued a stern warning to the US on December 2 that any interference with its satellite operations would be perceived as a declaration of war.
